Misc. Lot - $250 DLVD

Old Judge Metamorphic (Variation #4 in OJ Book)

T205 Phelps - PSA 4.5

T206 Chase - Looks like this was owned by a pair of early collectors back in the day which is pretty cool

T206 Killian - Solid EX, slight diamond cut, amazing borders

[url=https://ibb.co/mBM8q2f][img]https://i.ibb.co/rt1s6zD/1.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://ibb.co/nbvg6q9][img]https://i.ibb.co/9NL8cm6/phelps-final.jpg[/img][/url]
Wow. Unless this was supposed to be a total satire, I guess kids were legally allowed to buy tobacco products back then!
